projects.title: Get-SVG-Icons
projects.description: Scripting to parse and extract SVG Icons and integrate into VS Code Extension for searching and inline-recommending icons.

projects.title: Clarity
projects.description: Developed Flutter mobile app that lets users scan skincare products and receive customized ratings based on the product's compatibility for their skin needs. Users input their skin data to tailor the algorithm to give accurate ratings and recommendations for sccanned products.

projects.title: Twitter Skyline
projects.description: Implement complex full-stack web app that renders 3D buildings in the shape of a skyline to represent key metrics and trends of countries from the Twitter API. Post-processing was used to create a bloom effect, ray tracking was We used to hyperlink each building to a twitter topic.

projects.title: CARE International Somali - Maternal Hospital App
projects.description: Spearhead the product management and development of a web app to schedule appointments, track records, and offer telehealth support via chatting for 5,000+ patients for CARE International's Maternal Hospital in Somali.
